name: The Paper Plane
description: Bourbon, Aperol, Nonino, and fresh lemon juice come together in equal proportions for a drink that's a little sweet, a little bitter, a little fresh, and a little too easy drinking.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce bourbon, such as Weller 7-year or Eagle Rare

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Fill with ice and shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Strain into a coupe glass. Serve.
